mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS a_id,pub_id,title,address,start_time,end_time,description,3 AS `type`, a.gmt_create AS a_gmt_create,a.gmt_modified AS a_gmt_modified, `c`.id AS c_id,category_id,category_designation, `c`.gmt_create AS c_gmt_create,`c`.gmt_modified AS c_gmt_modified, i.id AS i_id,i.activity_Id,image_link, i.gmt_create AS i_gmt_create,i.gmt_modified AS i_gmt_modified, t.id AS t_id,content, t.gmt_create AS t_gmt_create,t.gmt_modified AS t_gmt_modified FROM activity_info AS a,activity_category AS c ON a.category=c.id LEFT JOIN activity_image AS i ON i.activity_id=a.id LEFT JOIN activity_tag AS `at` ON `at`.activity_id=a.id LEFT JOIN tag_of_activity AS t ON t.id=`at`.tag_id WHERE a.id=#{id}

SELECT a.id AS a_id, pub_id,title,address,start_time,end_time,description,3 AS `type`, a.gmt_create AS a_gmt_create,a.gmt_modified AS a_gmt_modified, `c`.id AS c_id,category_id,category_designation, `c`.gmt_create AS c_gmt_create,`c`.gmt_modified AS c_gmt_modified, i.id AS i_id,i.activity_id,image_link, i.gmt_create AS i_gmt_create,i.gmt_modified AS i_gmt_modified, t.id AS t_id,content, t.gmt_create AS t_gmt_create,t.gmt_modified AS t_gmt_modified FROM activity_info AS a LEFT JOIN activity_enshrine AS ae ON ae.activity_id = a.id LEFT JOIN activity_category AS c ON a.category=c.category_id LEFT JOIN activity_image AS i ON i.activity_id=a.id LEFT JOIN activity_tag AS `at` ON `at`.activity_id=a.id LEFT JOIN tag_of_activity AS t ON t.id=`at`.tag_id where ae.user_id = #{user.id} limit #{user.begin},#{user.size}
